Detailed Description

The content view parser create the content view tree.

The parser read the content view tree and return the root element : a content view node. The parser must be sub-classed and must redefine the method loadFromDevice().

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ContentViewParser::ContentViewParser ( bool  autoDelete = false  ) 

Create a content view parser used to fill the content of a node. If autoDelete is se to true, the object will be self destroyed after the content of the node read.
